subject: Add semantic color tokens for light/dark mode
body:
Created CSS variables and Tailwind tokens for consistent theming:

CSS Variables (in index.css):
- --color-text-default/muted/subtle/faint for text
- --color-surface/elevated/inset/hover for backgrounds
- --color-border/subtle/strong for borders

Tailwind Config (ui namespace):
- text-ui-text, text-ui-text-muted, etc.
- bg-ui-surface, bg-ui-surface-elevated, etc.
- border-ui-border, border-ui-border-subtle, etc.

Refactored components to use semantic classes instead of
paired light/dark classes (e.g., text-ui-text-muted instead
of text-zinc-600 dark:text-zinc-300).

This makes color maintenance easier and ensures consistency.
